definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Not the body flavor arrive to fail bitter and astringent, again how know success of sweet?
sentences.chinese: 不体味到失败的苦涩，又怎知成功的甘甜？

sentences.english: Truly, the pure fragrance of tea came out from the tradition of "no sugar".
sentences.chinese: 真的，中国茶的清香和甘甜，全在这不放糖的传统里。

sentences.english: E vil was sweet in his mouth, and he hid it under his tongue.
sentences.chinese: 邪恶在他口中虽觉甘甜，藏在他的舌下。

sentences.english: Come taste the sun-sweet berries of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，尝尝自然生长的浆果甘甜滋味。

sentences.english: Cool and sparkling mountain spring provided him sweet drinks; fresh tasty wild fruits sustained him.
sentences.chinese: 他饮着甘甜清冽的山泉，吃着鲜美如饴的山果。

sentences.english: In that the sweet spring rain, buds grow gradually moist leaves green.
sentences.chinese: 在那甘甜的春雨滋润下，芽渐渐长成绿绿的叶。

sentences.english: The taste of life was sweet as rain upon my tongue.
sentences.chinese: 人生的滋味，如雨水落在舌头上一样甘甜。

sentences.english: Through the ages, the earth mother milk with sweet nurtured a countless generations.
sentences.chinese: 古往今来，地球妈妈用甘甜的乳汁哺育了无数代子孙。

sentences.english: The last sweetness into the heavy wine.
Making you feel its sweety after taste and with strong shrink ality.
sentences.chinese: 回味甘甜且带有较强收敛性。

sentences.english: Yquem has unbelievable aging potential. Because it is so rich, opulent and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 狄甘甜白酒丰富，浓郁具有惊人的陈年潜力。

sentences.english: The quarter legs are rich with colloid, and the chicken breasts are fresh without dryness.
sentences.chinese: 鸡腿肉甘甜富胶质，鸡胸肉清爽而不干柴。

sentences.english: The roots of a tree are bitter but its fruit is sweet.
sentences.chinese: 树的根是苦的，但其果实是甘甜的。

sentences.english: She has never yet enjoyed sweet of life, never savour warm of the world.
sentences.chinese: 还不曾享受生活的甘甜，不曾品味人间的温暖。

sentences.english: The ice is clean and the water is good.
sentences.chinese: 这些冰十分的干净，变成的水也很甘甜。
这儿有清冽甘甜的小溪。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
